desc: Natural bug protection (Wearables and Skin Application). We only use natural active ingredients in all of our products (wristbands, clips, spray and roll-on). PARA’KITO is your caring, natural, effective protection. DEET-Free - Made in France.

layout.text:
Wherever adventure takes you! Long-lasting wearable devices for everyone.
Refillable & Waterproof!
